nodes.text: The BARC Command Vehicle was a variant of the BARC speeder that was used by both the Galactic Empire and the Rebel Alliance during the Galactic Civil War.

It was a one-person, modified repulsorlift speederbike once used by specialized Biker Advanced Recon Commandos to go on highly dangerous missions during the Clone Wars. It was an armored speeder, which was painted in the colors and designs of the Galactic Empire or Rebel Alliance.
In Star Wars Galaxies, the BARC Command Vehicle can be obtained once a player has reached the rank of Colonel in either the Imperial or Rebel Alliance army.
